column1: Little Goat Diner////Fast forward a year
column2: we were out last night celebrating a cousins birthday and he chose Little Goat for dinner. I had the veggie quesadilla and my fianc√© chose 2 different meals
column3: both of which were already out (a total or five or six items were already out)
column4: and he ended up with the short ribs. Well my quesadilla was just ok. I've had better. He enjoyed his short ribs
column5: but today he is vomiting and on the toilet. This guys never ever gets sick. He felt sick shortly after the meal so I know it's from the food. We planned a 3 day wknd to enjoy our time off
column6: and he is now sick and in bed.
